```{r include = FALSE}
rm(list=ls())
library('iNEXT')
library('ggplot2')

dat<- read.csv('data/metabinary_inext.csv', header = TRUE)


mdat <- as.matrix(apply(dat[,-1],2,as.integer))
row.names(mdat) <- dat[,1]
mdat[is.na(mdat)] <- 0
data.list <- list(mdat)

out <- iNEXT(data.list, datatype = "incidence_raw", endpoint = 500)

out
ggiNEXT(out) 
```
